name: Night of the Freezing Moon
description: The village of Felsstrond has come under attack from an invading army of undead forces. The Aurorian Crystal, a great artifact that has shielded the town from the undead for centuries, is being drained of its power by vampiric aethyrquartz crystals created by vampire overlords. You must destroy the vampiric crystals, and defeat the evil overlords!
